titleStmt.title: An historical account of some things relating to the nature of the English government and the conceptions which our fore-fathers had of it with some inferences thence made for the satisfaction of those who scruple the Oath of allegiance to King William and Queen Mary.
titleStmt.author: Whitby, Daniel, 1638-1726.

notesStmt.note: Half-title page title: An historical account of the English government.
